note: British/French (thank you Brexshit!). Live in the Haute Loire in France but political on both sides of the Channel. Vegetarian and love gardening and my dog. I'm often to be found rescuing worms and beetles etc. I'm a Nan but young at heart. I have four grown up children who are in Britain, France and Germany (yes, a German son, thanks again Brexshit!) and two French, two German wee ones. Want to see the end of the Tories. Let's have GREEN and P.R! Save the planet!
